message_1: What is the mean of the following data set: 12, 14, 20, 15, 22, 18?
message_2:
To find the mean (average) of a data set, you need to add up all the numbers and then divide by the number of items in the set. 

In this case, the data set has 6 numbers: 12, 14, 20, 15, 22, and 18.

First, add up the numbers: 12 + 14 + 20 + 15 + 22 + 18 = 101

Next, divide the sum by the number of items in the set (6): 101 รท 6 = 16.8333

The mean of the data set is approximately 16.83.
